medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began one week ago. Initially presented with elevated LFTs and bilirubin levels. Pain improved on arrival to the floor, with the patient denying any complaints.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Atrial Fibrillation; Basal Cell Cancer; prior surgeries include tonsillectomy, eye surgery as a child, and pilonidal cyst excision as a teenager.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of heart disease. No known history of malignancies.
